item.title: Learn TypeScript Basics in 2 days
item.description: Install TypeScript and TSLint $ npm install -g typescript tslint Compile ts files on changes $ tsc -w Recommended editor Use VisualStudioCode

item.title: Learn Webpack Basics in 2 days
item.description: Introduction Learn from https://webpack.js.org/guides/getting-started/ Clone my repo to follow commit hash by section : https://github.com/khanhicetea/learn-n-earn
